title: Francis Plagne (Artist Profile)
itunes:author: Liquid Architecture
itunes:subtitle: Artist Profile
itunes:summary:
Recently on Disclaimer, Philip Brophy deconstructed Francis Plagne’s discography, performances, writings, and approaches to music making. Francis Plagne is a musician from Melbourne whose work swings between songwriting and a variety of approaches, including group improvisation, instrumental abstraction, and domestic musique concrète.

Reflecting on his influences, recording process, and Brophy’s profile piece, Plagne talks through his entry into music making, his progression of albums, and experiences in collaboration.

https://disclaimer.org.au/contents/a-guitarist-with-a-museum-in-his-head-francis-plagne

Image: Rudi Williams
